---
name: doc-auto
description: "[development] doc-auto"
argument-hint: Optional input or selection
---

Generate/update documentation automatically based on the actual code.  
Include:
- endpoints  
- props/interfaces  
- data flow  
- dependencies  
- examples  
- diagrams (ASCII)

Ensure the documentation fully matches the current code (scan files).  
Output in clean Markdown with a table of contents.
